alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; Central Colorado River Basin; Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; San Juan River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 03 at 2:55PM MDT until October 05 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 are possible. * WHERE...Central Colorado River Basin, Four Corners/Upper Dolores River, Animas River Basin and San Juan River Basin. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night through early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Animas River Basin; Central Colorado River Basin; Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; San Juan River Basin
